compiler

Class Scanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • compiler.Scanner

  •  class Scanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Expression token scanners.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Scanner.State
      DFA state.
      (package private) static class  Scanner.Token
      Tokens returned by the scanner.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private char[] buf
      The current character from the input.
      private static char EOF_MARK
      A character that represents end of input.
      private java.io.Reader input
      The scanner text input stream.
      private Scanner.State state
      The current discrete finite automaton (DFA) state.
      private java.lang.StringBuilder tokenString
      A place to store the text of tokens with distinct text representations.

    • Method Detail

      • next

        Scanner.Token next()
        Return the next token from the input stream. This implements a little DFA to identify tokens.
        Returns:
        the next token from the input

      • getTokenString

        java.lang.String getTokenString()
        Get the string representation of the token, if it has one. See Token for those that do.
        Returns:
        string representation of the most recently scanned token
